app.title: IP Check - Free IP Address Lookup Tool & Network Speed Test
app.description: Free IP address lookup and network speed test tools. Get detailed information about any IP address and measure your internet connection speed. No registration required.
app.clearCacheDescription: Clear your browser's cache to ensure you get the latest version of the website

tools.section_description: Comprehensive network analysis tools including speed testing and IP information lookup. All tools are free to use and no registration required.
tools.speedtest_title: Network Speed Test - Check Download & Upload Speed
tools.ipdistance_title: IP Distance - Calculate Geographic Distance Between IPs
tools.geolocation_title: Geolocation Tool - Get Your Precise Location

privacy.meta_title: Privacy Policy - How We Handle Your Data
privacy.meta_description: Privacy policy for IP Check Tools. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our IP lookup and speed test services.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section_1_intro: When you use our IP Check tool, we collect:
privacy.section_2_intro: We use the collected information to:
privacy.use_provide_service: Provide IP address details and geolocation information
privacy.section_3_intro: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google AdSense may use cookies and web beacons to collect data, including:
privacy.google_policy_text: For more information about Google AdSense, please visit
privacy.section_4_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.section_5_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page.
privacy.section_6_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us.

speedtest.meta_title: Network Speed Test - Check Your Download & Upload Speeds | IP Check Tools
speedtest.meta_description: Test your internet connection speed with our free online speed test tool. Measure download and upload speeds instantly. No registration required.
speedtest.meta_keywords: speed test, network speed test, internet speed test, bandwidth test, download speed, upload speed, free speed test
speedtest.og_title: Network Speed Test - Check Your Download & Upload Speeds
speedtest.og_description: Test your internet connection speed with our free online speed test tool. Measure download and upload speeds instantly.
speedtest.page_description: Test your internet connection speed with our free online tool. Get accurate measurements of your download and upload speeds.
speedtest.privacy_notice: This test will generate data traffic. Results may vary depending on network conditions and server load.

ipDistance.title: IP Distance Calculator - Measure Geographic Distance Between IPs | IP Check Tools
ipDistance.description: Calculate the geographical distance between two IP addresses in real-time. See how far apart two internet connections are located.
ipDistance.keywords: ipdistance, ip distance result, geographic ip measurement, ip location distance, distance between addresses, ip coordinates distance, location tracker, ip mapping result, how far apart are ips
ipDistance.ogTitle: IP Distance Calculator - Measure Geographic Distance Between IPs
ipDistance.ogDescription: Calculate the geographical distance between two IP addresses in real-time.

ipdistance.title: IP Distance Calculator
ipdistance.generate_instructions: Generate a unique link and invite someone else to visit it. We'll automatically calculate the geographical distance between your IP addresses.
ipdistance.instruction1: Share this link with someone else you want to calculate IP distance with.
ipdistance.instruction2: The link is valid for 60 minutes.
ipdistance.instruction3: Only the first two unique IP addresses will be recorded.
ipdistance.instruction4: Once two different IPs visit the link, the distance will be calculated automatically.
ipdistance.about_description: The IP Distance tool uses geolocation data from IP addresses to calculate the approximate distance between two internet connections.
ipdistance.privacy_description: We only collect IP information to calculate the distance. All session data is automatically deleted after 60 minutes. No permanent records are kept.

geolocation.meta_title: Geolocation Tool - Get Your Precise Location | IP Check Tools
geolocation.meta_description: Get your precise geolocation information using GPS or network data. Find your coordinates, address, timezone, and location details instantly.
geolocation.meta_keywords: geolocation, location finder, GPS coordinates, latitude longitude, my location, find my location, location tool, GPS location
geolocation.og_title: Geolocation Tool - Get Your Precise Location
geolocation.og_description: Get your precise geolocation information using GPS or network data. Find your coordinates and address instantly.
geolocation.title: Geolocation Tool
geolocation.description: Get your precise location information using GPS or network data. Find your coordinates, address, and more.
geolocation.geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser.
geolocation.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred while retrieving location.
geolocation.permission_denied_notice: Location access has been denied. Please enable location permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
geolocation.step_1: Click the 'Get My Location' button to start the location detection process.
geolocation.step_2: Allow location access when prompted by your browser. This is required to get your precise coordinates.
geolocation.step_3: View your location details including coordinates and additional data. You can copy coordinates or view your location on a map.
